TvTeam is a pretty shady group, they never include a hint of info about their uploads. It's always a mystery what you're going to end up with exactly with a TvTeam share.  

That's not to say they should die of cancer of the mouth or anything, that's a bit extreme. But they do make me appreciate all the more the uploaders who take pride enough in their work to lay out exactly what it is they're sharing with we the unwashed masses here.

TvTeam may seem a bit shady, but they're legit. I think they're just in the business of re-upping others work, not so much in the description business. I've found shows from them in the past that i couldn't find anywhere else, or content where the original torrent was dead.
I think the name of the first explains his mental state quite well....... thanks TvTeam, nothing more to say but this movie is worth the ticket price.

Holy fuck theres a lot of whiney assholes on here. If you want a HD version go pay and see it. Otherwise make due with what these people who bring it to us for free do.

This is just an early release. Get it?

They are doing the best they can for now. Better is on the way. Be patient or pay to see it, or wait for the DVD rip in two months. I'm sure you all know the procedure. Be grateful to these uploaders.

Without them, we would be constantly ripped off by the MPAA and the RIAA.
